Description: Lapis lazuli amuletic figure of Harpocrates standing on a crocodile whose tail he holds in his right hand; back-pillar.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Dr Joseph John Acworth
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.16
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
